Name: Unexpected Collaboration
Narrative_Structure: Initial Mistrust -> Shared Circumstances -> Cooperation -> Resolution (or Not..)

Name: Confrontation with the Unknown
Narrative_Structure: Routine -> Strange Event -> Investigation -> Explanation/Mystery Resolved (or Not..)

Name: Problem Solving
Narrative_Structure: Obstacle -> Analysis -> Search for Solutions -> Resolution (or Not..)

Name: Group Collaboration
Narrative_Structure: Shared Task -> Role Allocation -> Interaction -> Collective Production

Name: Motivation and Perseverance
Narrative_Structure: Initial Interest -> Difficulties -> Discouragement -> Sustained Effort -> Resolution

Name: Intergenerational Transmission
Narrative_Structure: Ancestral Knowledge -> Young Learner -> Transmission -> Continuity/Transformation

Name: Facing One's Fears
Narrative_Structure: Avoidance -> Gradual Confrontation -> Overcoming -> Personal Growth

Name: Loss of Control
Narrative_Structure: Routine -> Disruptive Event -> Disorientation -> Return to Normality/Chaos

Name: Risk Awareness
Narrative_Structure: Ignorance -> Mild Symptom -> Alert -> Preventive/Curative Action

Name: Adoption of a New Habit
Narrative_Structure: Reluctance -> Attempt -> Observation/Repetition -> Integration into Routine

Name: Search for Reliable Information
Narrative_Structure: Trigger -> Multiple Sources -> Sorting and Analysis -> Informed Decision

Name: Problem Prevention
Narrative_Structure: Risk Factors -> Information -> Behavioral Change -> Risk Reduction
